Sms_carrier

Superclass representing a record with information about a SMS carrier.

Properties

  • __table = ‘sms_carrier’ - table name
  • id - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • name - varchar(64) unique_key
  • email_pattern - varchar(191) not_null not 255 because utf8mb4 takes more space
  • created - datetime() not_null
  • modified - timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Summary
schemaDefReturns an array representation of the table’s schema definition in the DB.
toEmailAddressGiven the email pattern in a given SMS entry, turn it into a gateway email address.
